doc.field: Campaign for Peace and Democracy Records
Campaign for Peace and Democracy Records

Records, c.1980-1983; Peace and Democracy News, 1984-1995 (name changed to Peace and Democracy in 1994). Note: Campaign for Peace and Democracy East and West was founded in 1982, and became Campaign for Peace and Democracy in 1990. Some material is from predecessor organizations.
